text: 12.13 Jon 6.63, Lom 6.5, Gal 3.28, Kol 3.11 Pen God Kawnan ne nokom ak chɨnop mɨdupsek gek ñɨg pakɨnok. Chɨn Juda binɨb okok ke, binɨb Juda mel okok ke mɨdɨl, binɨb wog gɨñeb bɨawl olap muk okok mɨdebal ke, binɨb wog gep bɨawl olap muk okok ma mɨdebal okok ke mɨdɨl, mɨdupsek ñɨg pakñɨl mɨñɨl mubwak nokom tek mɨdobun. Pen God chɨnop mɨdupsek gek, God Kawnan ne ak ñɨg ñɨŋɨnok tek don, chɨnop nab ayaŋ am yek.
